message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.NI

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper discusses security and privacy-preserving techniques such as homomorphic encryption and blockchain, which are commonly studied in this sub-category.
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The proposed paradigm involves decentralized and cooperative computing among scattered nodes, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper mentions the use of machine learning and data-driven analysis tools, which are studied in this sub-category.
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks): The paper discusses the use of software defined networking (SDN) techniques, which are commonly studied in this sub-category.
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper discusses the use of SDN techniques, which are also studied in this sub-category.
